response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just any commodity; it represents a significant investment and a symbol of excellence. I am extending to you the chance to own this masterpiece at an exclusive price of $2,000,000. Given its unparalleled quality and the potential it holds, I believe this offer presents an exceptional opportunity for both of us. Should you be interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the acquisition, please let me know at your earliest convenience. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with someone as discerning as yourself.", "product_price": 2000000}
